about_the_game:
Welcome to Bob Fight, the hilarious combat game where you play as fearless Bobs engaging in epic battles for survival! In this wacky party game, up to 4 players can duke it out in arenas filled with traps and dangers.

Face off against your friends in furious fights where anything goes! Use hilarious moves, wacky tactics, and anything you can get your hands on to eject your opponents from the arena. Whether it's throwing cream pies, jumping on unstable platforms, or engaging in bare-knuckle brawls, every round victory brings you one step closer to ultimate glory.

Collect crowns by winning rounds and be the first to reach the required number of crowns to be crowned the Bob Fight champion! With colorful graphics, comedic movements, and frantic action, Bob Fight is the perfect game for wild nights with friends.

Prepare for hours of hilarious chaos, laughter, and fierce competition in Bob Fight. Who among you will become the king of the Bobs?

Key Features:

  • Hilarious combat for up to 4 players: Battle your friends in whimsical arenas where anything can happen!
  • Wacky moves: Use ludicrous fighting techniques to eject your opponents from the arena.
  • Interactive arenas: Avoid traps and use the environment to your advantage!
  • Crown collection: Win rounds to earn crowns and become the ultimate Bob Fight champion!
  • Colorful graphics and comedic animation: Dive into a world full of hilarious characters and absurd situations.
Join the madness of Bob Fight and show your friends who the real brawl king is!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 8800 GT, AMD 5670, Intel HD 3000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: BobFight is a hilarious party game for 2 to 4 players where you play as quirky characters in a series of chaotic mini-games. Take on your friends in uproarious challenges, earn crowns, and become the undisputed king of the party! Who will be the last Bob standing? Find out in BobFight!
